----- Original Message -----
From: "Su" <suceress@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 20, 2003 2:16 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Everquest: Lost Dungeons of Norrath


> http://everquest.station.sony.com/lostdungeons/
> luv,
> -Su
>
>
> > I haven't been on in a week so didn't see the
> > announcement. Can you give a link?
> >
> > Quwi
> >
> > --- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> > > So, another expansion pack is coming out. The
> > > features listed look pretty
> > > cool.
> > > I'll be interested to see how they are implemented
> > > and how they work in the
> > > game.
> > > Anyone else looked at the webpage and have any
> > > thoughts on this?
> > > I love the idea of being able to unlock, open, or
> > > bash open chests and such.
> > > That is something I feel was missing from this game.
> > > And the private space
> > > sounds good too.
> > > Thoughts?
> > > luv,
> > > -Su
> > >
> > >
> >
